law.catch_line: Two or more licensed morticians or funeral directors may practice mortuary science as a partnership....

text.section: Two or more licensed morticians or funeral directors may practice mortuary science as a partnership.
A partnership shall be conducted under the names of all the partners.

Before practicing as a partnership, the licensees shall:
Notify the Board that they will be practicing as a partnership; and
Submit to the Board the name and address of each partner.
